content: Fortive Corp  said on Wednesday it would buy Landauer Inc   a provider of radiation safety and outsourced medical physics services  for about $770 million  including debt.
name: Fortive Corporation
title: Fortive to buy radiation safety company Landauer for $770 million

content: Sept 6 Fortive Corp  which makes industrial tools  said on Wednesday it would buy Landauer Inc   a provider of radiation safety and outsourced medical physics services  for about $770 million  including debt.

title: Tools maker Fortive to buy radiation safety co Landauer for $770 mln
